00017 // EARS
00018 #include "AssociationFramework.hpp"
00019 #include "AssociationModel.hpp"
00020 #include "Logger.hpp"
00021 #include "Model1.hpp"
00022 #include "Model2.hpp"
00023 #include "OutputWriter.hpp"
00024 
00025 // Lemur
00026 #include "IndexManager.hpp"
00027 #include "Param.hpp"
00028 
00029 
00031 void 
00032 ears::AssociationFramework::run( std::string task )
00033 {
00034   //
00035   // load parameters
00036   //
00037   if ( task != "ef" && task != "ep" ) {
00038     LOG( logERROR ) << "unsupported task: '" << task << "'";
00039     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );
00040   }  
00041   
00042   std::string modelname = lemur::api::ParamGetString( "model" );
00043   if ( modelname.length() == 0 ) {
00044     LOG( logERROR ) << "Parameter 'model' is not set";
00045     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );    
00046   }
00047   if ( modelname != "1" && modelname != "2" ) {
00048     LOG( logERROR ) << "Unknown model '" << modelname << "'. Valid values: 1 or 2";
00049     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );            
00050   }
00051   
00052   //
00053   // load index
00054   //
00055   std::string indexFile = lemur::api::ParamGetString( "index" );
00056   if ( indexFile.length() == 0 ) {
00057     LOG( logERROR ) << "Parameter 'index' is not set";
00058     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );    
00059   }
00060   LOG( logINFO ) << "Loading index '" << indexFile << "'";
00061   try {    
00062     index_ = lemur::api::IndexManager::openIndex( indexFile );    
00063   }
00064   catch ( const lemur::api::Exception& e ) {
00065     LOG( logERROR ) << "Can't open index, check parameter index";
00066     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );
00067   }      
00068   LOG( logDEBUG ) << index_->docCount() << " documents";
00069 
00070   //
00071   // load associations; note that they depend on the model
00072   // 
00073   if ( modelname == "1" )   
00074     entities_ = new EntityRep( EntityRep::aiENTITY );
00075   if ( modelname == "2" )
00076     entities_ = new EntityRep( EntityRep::aiDOCUMENT );
00077   entities_->loadAssociations( *index_ );
00078   
00079   //
00080   // load queries
00081   //
00082   queries_ = new QueryRep();
00083   queries_->loadQueries( *index_ );
00084   
00085   //
00086   // Run model, i.e,. calculate p(q|e) for all queries and entities
00087   //
00088   AssociationModel* model;
00089   if ( modelname == "1" ) 
00090     model = new Model1( *index_, *entities_, *queries_ );
00091   if ( modelname == "2" )
00092     model = new Model2( *index_, *entities_, *queries_ );
00093   model->init();
00094   ASSOCRES_T pqe = model->scoreAll();  
00095   delete model;
00096 
00097   //
00098   // write output
00099   //
00100   OutputWriter* output = new OutputWriter( *entities_, *queries_ );
00101   output->outputAssocRes( task, pqe );
00102   delete output;
00103 
00104   //
00105   // clean up
00106   //
00107   pqe.clear();
00108   delete entities_;
00109   delete queries_;
00110   delete index_;  
00111   
00112   LOG( logINFO ) << "Over and out";
00113 }
